text: niyata vasayenma api israyila paramparave daruvanta (porondu vu) itamat pahasukamin yukta sthanayak laba di honda aharayanda ovunta laba demin sitiyemu. tavada satya gnanaya (namæti mema dharmaya) ovun veta pæminena turu (meyata ovun) venaskam dækvuye næta. (pæmini pasuma meya pratiksepa kara venaskam karannaha). kumak sandaha ovun venaskam karannoda, (e gæna) ovunta viniscaya dinadi niyata vasayenma (eyayi satyaya yayi) obage deviyan tinduvak denu æta
